    <p>1	Confirm that there are no matters which have altered any of the Ethical Considerations set out on the Regulation of Auditor’s Checklist (Ac2), and Provision of Non-Audit Services to Audit Clients (Ac3).  </p>
<p>If matters have arisen, are we able to continue as auditors?</p>
<i>
    <p>The following matters should be considered:</p>
    <ul>
        <li>Any matters brought to the attention of the Audit Engagement Partner regarding the audit firm’s independence from the client.</li>
        <li>Any matters brought to the attention of the firm’s Ethics Partner regarding the audit firm’s independence from the client.</li>
        <li>Any new non-audit services being provided requiring the completion of form “Provision of Non-Audit Services to Audit Clients”.</li>
        <li>Any fraud which brings into consideration the integrity of management. </li>
    </ul>
</i>
